media.title: Images
media.description: You can upload {{min}}-{{max}} images per listing

desc.info: Describe your property in detail. Quality posts should have a description between 200-4000 characters. Please note that posting inappropriate or spam links is against our terms of use. If detected, your account will be permanently banned without prior notice. Allowed links include: links to your website or company, Facebook fan pages, LINE accounts, or your social media accounts. You can add links by highlighting text and clicking the chain icon above.

validation.required: Please upload {{min}}-{{max}} images for your listing
validation.count: Please upload {{min}}-{{max}} images for your listing
